hadiths.text: Hanzala al-Aslami reported:I heard Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) as narrating from Allah's Apostle (ï·º) who said: By Him in Whose Hand is my life. Ibn Maryam (Jesus Christ) would certainly pronounce Talbiya for Hajj or for Umra or for both (simultaneously as a Qiran) In the valley of Rauha
